--- title: "Handling Data with Pandas" jupyter: python3 execute: error: true order: 1 --- In this module we will learn how to handle data with the pandas library in Python. Pandas is a powerful library that provides data structures and data analysis tools for Python. It is widely used for data manipulation and analysis, making it an essential tool for data scientists and analysts. ::: {#c0605d82 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Import libraries import pandas as pd import numpy as np ``` ::: ## pandas DataFrames DataFrames are two-dimensional, size-mutable, potentially heterogeneous tabular data structures with labeled axes (rows and columns). They are similar to SQL tables or Excel spreadsheets. DataFrames can be created from various data sources, such as lists, dictionaries, or CSV files. ::: {#3910a3b7 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} kids = [['Mike', 'boy', 7, 128], ['George', 'boy', 4, 112], ['Lily', 'girl', 8, 132], ['Yu', 'girl', 10, 143], ['Dan', 'boy', 9, 138]] colNames = ['name', 'gender', 'age', 'height'] ``` ::: ::: {#d441593d .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":20,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754653890523,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} df = pd.DataFrame(data = kids, columns = colNames) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ```{=html}
name gender age height
0 Mike boy 7 128
1 George boy 4 112
2 Lily girl 8 132
3 Yu girl 10 143
4 Dan boy 9 138
``` ::: ::: ::: {#cf8089ff .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":7,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754653902698,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Check the column data types df.dtypes ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ``` name object gender object age int64 height int64 dtype: object ``` ::: ::: ## Import data from a csv file ::: {#e7e5ba2a .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} df = pd.read_csv('diabetes.csv') ``` ::: ::: {#337b86e2 .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":54,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754663054240,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6} ```{=html}

Subsetting DataFrames ::: {#e0ed4013 .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":51,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754660782657,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Select one column using double brackets df[['Pregnancies']].head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=12} ```{=html}
Pregnancies

1 1
2 8

4 0

``` ::: ::: ::: {#f7edd93e .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":9,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754657967921,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=24} ``` {.python .cell-code} # pandas series df.loc[:, 'Age'].head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=24} ``` 0 50 1 31 2 32 3 21 4 33 Name: Age, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#c49396c9 .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":12,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754658428021,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=25} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['Pregnancies'].value_counts() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=25} ``` Pregnancies 1 135 0 111 2 103 3 75 4 68 5 57 6 50 7 45 8 38 9 28 10 24 11 11 13 10 12 9 14 2 17 1 15 1 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ## Filtering DataFrames ::: {#66417baf .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":9,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754663064988,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=26} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Notice that the filter produces a pandas series of True and False values filter_pregnancies = df['Pregnancies'] >= 3 filter_pregnancies ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=26} ``` 0 True 1 False 2 True 3 False 4 False ... 763 True 764 False 765 True 766 False 767 False Name: Pregnancies, Length: 768, dtype: bool ``` ::: ::: ::: {#b89f511d .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":58,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754661404831,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=27} ``` {.python .cell-code} filter_pregnancies.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=27} ``` 0 True 1 False 2 True 3 False 4 False Name: Pregnancies, dtype: bool ``` ::: ::: ::: {#b7ddd1c0 .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":52,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754661412448,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=28} ``` {.python .cell-code} df[filter_pregnancies] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=28} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {#04ff21f1 .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":81,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754661439128,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=30} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Notice that it looks like nothing changes # This is because we didn't update the dataframe after applying the filter df['Pregnancies'].value_counts() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=30} ``` Pregnancies 1 135 0 111 2 103 3 75 4 68 5 57 6 50 7 45 8 38 9 28 10 24 11 11 13 10 12 9 14 2 17 1 15 1 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#9f3ca300 .cell execution_count=31} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Update the dataframe to contain observations with pregnancies <= 3 df = df.loc[filter_pregnancies, :] ``` ::: ::: {#950ad1cf .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":13,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754661451794,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=32} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['Pregnancies'].value_counts() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=32} ``` Pregnancies 3 75 4 68 5 57 6 50 7 45 8 38 9 28 10 24 11 11 13 10 12 9 14 2 17 1 15 1 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#25f21bb7 .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":46,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754662395881,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=33} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['Age'].value_counts() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=33} ``` Age 28 20 41 18 37 18 31 16 27 15 30 15 22 15 29 15 42 14 24 14 25 14 45 13 34 13 38 13 36 13 26 12 43 12 39 12 32 12 40 12 33 10 46 10 35 8 51 8 23 7 50 7 58 6 44 6 60 5 54 5 57 5 21 5 49 5 52 5 48 5 47 5 63 4 55 4 56 3 53 3 66 3 69 2 61 2 67 2 65 2 59 1 81 1 64 1 62 1 70 1 68 1 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#b442ac5f .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":11,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754662506892,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=34} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Notice that the filter produces a pandas series of True and False values df['Age'] <= 38 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=34} ``` 0 False 2 True 5 True 6 True 7 True ... 759 False 761 False 762 True 763 False 765 True Name: Age, Length: 419, dtype: bool ``` ::: ::: ::: {#f7b42562 .cell execution_count=35} ``` {.python .cell-code} filter_age = df['Age'] <= 38 ``` ::: ::: {#256c11dc .cell execution_count=36} ``` {.python .cell-code} df = df.loc[filter_age, :] ``` ::: ::: {#5693405b .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":20,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754662842299,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=37} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['Age'].value_counts() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=37} ``` Age 28 20 37 18 31 16 30 15 22 15 27 15 29 15 24 14 25 14 34 13 36 13 38 13 32 12 26 12 33 10 35 8 23 7 21 5 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ### Combining filters ::: {#0e736707 .cell quarto-private-1='{"key":"executionInfo","value":{"elapsed":70,"status":"ok","timestamp":1754663151218,"user":{"displayName":"Xuebin Yang","userId":"18047631927912204745"},"user_tz":240}}' execution_count=38} ``` {.python .cell-code} df.loc[filter_pregnancies & filter_age, :] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=38} ```{=html}
